item.description:
I feel like a hike tomorrow despite the cold...any takers?

Long Hill is a TTOR property - wooded trails so it should be reasonably sheltered. Wear lots of layers plus yaktrax as it will be icy underfoot and it's not totally flat!

We did this one last year as our inaugural hike - it's not too long (maybe an hour) but if you're dying to get outside it might just do the trick..

A popular 1.2-mile main loop trail passes through quintessentially New England woodlands dotted by vernal pools and imposing boulders.


572 Essex Street
Beverly, MA
Telephone: 978.921.1944
E-mail: neregion@ttor.org



From Rt. 128 Exit 18, take Rt. 22 North 1 mi. Bear left at split in road and continue for 0.2 mi. on Essex Street to entrance on left (street number 572 is on the brick pillars). Parking area (50 cars) is up the driveway on left.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Long Hill at the last minute
